sentences: Kui ta oleks siin, ta räägiks meiega.
Ma sooviksin, et sa räägiksid oma plaanidest.
context: The Estonian word 'räägiks' is a conditional form of the verb 'rääkima' (to speak/say). It represents the third person singular conditional mood, used to express hypothetical speech or what someone would say under certain conditions. This form is commonly used in conditional sentences and polite requests.
